data.text:
@WesElyMD @nickmmark @NEJM @VUMC_ID @VUMC_Vaccines @PedsICU_JC What diseases are 12-18 y/o getting?
Why would 12-18 y/o be getting rushed to ICU & dying? 

So youâ€™re saying that injecting healthy kids with this man made Pfizer injection - means they will never die of disease?

What sort of miracle drug is this exactly?

@WesElyMD @NEJM @VUMC_ID @VUMC_Vaccines @PedsICU_JC My twice-vaxxed grandson got COVID a couple of weeks ago (the day before scheduled booster), and his symptoms were extremely mild -- a not alarming cough for two days, followed by two days of mild fatigue (or might have been boredom or teen ennui), and that was it

@WesElyMD @NEJM @VUMC_ID @VUMC_Vaccines @PedsICU_JC I wish they'd get the vaccine out for the <5s.  I have suspicions than many of Nova Scotia's admissions since  school started back on Jan 10th have been unvaccinated/not fully vaccinated children. There was a huge spike in unvaxxed hospitalizations about 3 weeks after the 10th.
